Uses of Interface
org.unbunt.ella.resource.SimpleResource

Packages that use SimpleResource
org.unbunt.ella Provides an implementation of the EllaScript programming language. 
org.unbunt.ella.compiler Provides infrastructure for compiling programs written in the EllaScript language. 
org.unbunt.ella.engine.context Provides interfaces to be implemented by classes representing execution contexts of programs executed by the engine. 
org.unbunt.ella.resource Provides an infrastructure for working with various types of resources in a generic way.

          Creates a new Ella instance for compilation or execution of the EllaScript program specified by the given resource.

Uses of SimpleResource in org.unbunt.ella.engine.context
 

Methods in org.unbunt.ella.engine.context that return SimpleResource
 SimpleResource Context.getScriptResource()
          Returns the resource representing the EllaScript program this context represents the execution context for.
 

Methods in org.unbunt.ella.engine.context with parameters of type SimpleResource
 void Context.setScriptResource(SimpleResource scriptResource)
          Sets the given resource as the resource representing the EllaScript program this context serves as execution context for.
